A China Steel Supplier To Change The World. We're Shanxi Steel.

Shanxi Steel is a large-scale professional metal enterprise that combines sales, research, and expertise. We seamlessly integrate manufacturing and sales operations, ensuring excellence and expertise in every facet of our business.

OUR MISSION

Our mission is to deliver superior quality metal products by adhering to the highest standards of manufacturing excellence. We strive to exceed customer expectations through innovation, precision, and unwavering commitment to quality.

Service We Provide

Shanxi Steel, high-end manufacturing and processing to look for high-quality steel.

Cutting

Our cutting services feature automation and precision, ensuring accurate dimensions and clean edges for all your steel requirements using advanced technology and equipment.

Welding

Our expertise in various welding processes combines skilled craftsmanship with modern techniques to deliver strong, durable welds that meet the highest industry standards.

Finishing

Professional finishing services for industrial construction and specific types of building, achieving the perfect surface quality and appearance for your steel products.

Why Choose Us?

To Be Recognized As The Premier Global Supplier

We aim to expand our reach to more countries, constantly pushing the boundaries of technology and service to meet the future demands of the metal industry. Through continuous improvement and dedication, we seek to empower industries worldwide, contributing to a sustainable and innovative future.

Shanxi Steel stands out for its strict adherence to national and international standards, ensuring that every product we deliver is of the highest quality and reliability.

With a customer base in over 40 countries, we have established ourselves as a global player in the metal industry.

As a large-scale professional metal enterprise that integrates production and sales, Shanxi Steel offers seamless solutions from material selection to final delivery.
